title: I have the new player website homepage, can I please not?
body: I visit the website a lot to see if there's anything new going on. A few months ago i got the new player homepage instead of the normal one (i'm level 30) i was wondering if this could be reverted so i could see new things easier. Is anyone else getting this?

replies.body:
It looks like we're showcasing some pretty big changes to the new player guide, which is why it's featured on the homepage. Featured articles and content shows up for everyone, so there's not a way to prevent that content from coming up. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
When will this revert to the usual feature articles on the homepage, thank you for answering i thought mine was glitched or something.
Yeah, I get it too.  I think everyone gets the same webpage.
